SharedScripts.Name: SABnzbd
SharedScripts.Description: Class that interacts with the SABnzbd API

SharedScripts.Name: FileFlows API
SharedScripts.Description: Class that interacts with the FileFlows API

SystemScripts.Name: Delete Rogue _UNPACK_ Directories
SystemScripts.Description: Will check any _UNPACK_ directories, and if they haven't be modified in 24 hours will delete that directory

SystemScripts.Name: SABnzbd - Pause Downloads
SystemScripts.Description:
Pauses SABnzbd if the current file processing queue is greater than 30 files
If the processing queue is not greater than 30 files, then it will resume SABnzbd

SystemScripts.Name: Nvidia - Encoder Check
SystemScripts.Description:
Checks to see if the NVIDIA encoder is available before an encode and if not will
request FileFlows restart

SystemScripts.Name: Delete Empty Folders
SystemScripts.Description: Reads a variable 'DeleteEmptyFolders' and iterates all folders defined there and will delete any empty folder found within, leaving the root folder

SystemScripts.Name: Add MKV extension to files without an extension
SystemScripts.Description: Monitors the directories listed in the variable AddExtensionDirectoryList and any file thats found without an extenion, MKV will be added to it

SystemScripts.Name: Apprise - FileFlows Server Updating
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Apprise notification the FileFlows Server is being automatically updated

SystemScripts.Name: Apprise - Notify File Processing Failed
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Apprise notification when a file failed to be processed

SystemScripts.Name: Apprise - Notify File Processed
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Apprise notification when a file has been successfully processed

SystemScripts.Name: Apprise - FileFlows Server Update Available
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Apprise notification when a FileFlows server update is available

SystemScripts.Name: Gotify - Notify File Processing Failed
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Gotify notification when a file failed to be processed

SystemScripts.Name: Gotify - FileFlows Server Updating
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Gotify notification the FileFlows Server is being automatically updated

SystemScripts.Name: Gotify - FileFlows Server Update Available
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Gotify notification when a FileFlows server update is available

SystemScripts.Name: Gotify - Notify File Processed
SystemScripts.Description: Sends a Gotify notification when a file has been successfully processed

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Upscale Anime (Dandere2x) [Docker]
FlowScripts.Description:
Upscales anime using Dandere2x inside a docker container
Requires TempPathHost environment variable to be set if running inside a docker container

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Has Audio
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if there is an audio track on a video file

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Export All Subtitles
FlowScripts.Description: Exports all subtitles from a video file

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Deblocking
FlowScripts.Description: Remove blocking artifacts from input video.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Has 5.1 Audio
FlowScripts.Description: Determines if a video has a 5.1 channel track

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Denoise Non-Linear Means
FlowScripts.Description: Denoise frames using Non-Local Means algorithm.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - FPS greater than
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if a video's fps is greater than specified.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Inject HDR10+ metadata
FlowScripts.Description: Injects The Hdr10+ Metadata from the original file into the current working file

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Resolution
FlowScripts.Description: Determines a video's resolution and outputs accordingly

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Bitrate greater than
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if a video's bitrate is greater than specified.

FlowScripts.Path: Scripts/Flow/Video/Video - Set Original Language from MovieDB.js
FlowScripts.Name: Video - Set Original Language from MovieDB
FlowScripts.Description:
Gets either TV Show Information or Movie Information from a meta flow element and updates any audio tracks with missing language codes
with the original language of the show/movie
Requires the "Movie Lookup" or "TV Show Lookup" to be executed first to work

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Upscale Anime (Video2x) [Docker]
FlowScripts.Description:
Upscales anime using Video2x inside a docker container
Requires TempPathHost environment variable to be set if running inside a docker container

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Downscale greater than 1080p
FlowScripts.Description:
If a video's resolution is greater than 1080p, this script will update the FFMPEG Builder video track with a filter
to downscale the video to 1080p when the FFMPEG Builder Executor runs.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Downscale greater than 720p
FlowScripts.Description:
If a video's resolution is greater than 720p, this script will update the FFMPEG Builder video track with a filter
to downscale the video to 720p when the FFMPEG Builder Executor runs.

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Has 2.0 Audio
FlowScripts.Description: Determines if a video has a 2.0 (stereo) channel track

FlowScripts.Name: Video - Delete Non-Original Language Audio
FlowScripts.Description:
Checks the "Movie Lookup" information for original language, and will delete any audio tracks
with languages set that do not match the original language.
Requires the "Movie Lookup" node to be executed first to work

FlowScripts.Name: NVIDIA - Below Encoder Limit
FlowScripts.Description: Checks the count of NVIDIA encodes currently processing and see if it is below a limit

FlowScripts.Name: 7Zip - Compress to Zip
FlowScripts.Description: Uses 7Zip to zip files

FlowScripts.Name: Folder - Copy Folder
FlowScripts.Description: Copies a folder from one location to another

FlowScripts.Name: File - Older Than
FlowScripts.Description: Checks if a file is older than the specified days

FlowScripts.Name: Image - Convert (ImageMagick)
FlowScripts.Description: Converts images using ImageMagick

FlowScripts.Name: Sonarr - Get Original Language
FlowScripts.Description: Lookups a file in Sonarr and gets its original language ISO-693-1 code for it

FlowScripts.Name: Radarr - Get Original Language
FlowScripts.Description: Lookups a file in Radarr and gets its original language ISO-693-1 code for it

FunctionScripts.Name: Video - Downscale Greater then 1080p
FunctionScripts.Description: Adds a downscale filter to FFMPEG Builder any file greater than 1080p

FunctionScripts.Name: Video - Resolution
FunctionScripts.Description: A switch statement for video resolution

FunctionScripts.Name: Video - Bitrate Greater Than
FunctionScripts.Description: Checks if a video files bitrate is greater than a specific bitrate

FunctionScripts.Name: File - Greater Than 1GB
FunctionScripts.Description: Checks if a file is larger than 1 GB

WebhookScripts.Name: Radarr - Process
WebhookScripts.Description: When a new file is added, call this webhook to process the file

LibraryTemplates.Name: SABnzbd Music
LibraryTemplates.Description:
Library to monitor a "complete" downloads directory from SABnzbd.

This library can then use a flow to convert music into a target format, and place those music files in destination folder e.g. "converted".

The application that instructed SABnzbd to do the download can monitor the "converted" folder for completed files.

LibraryTemplates.Name: SABnzbd Videos
LibraryTemplates.Description:
Library to monitor a "complete" downloads directory from SABnzbd.

This library can then use a flow to convert videos into a target format, and place those videos in destination folder e.g. "converted".

The application that instructed SABnzbd to do the download can monitor the "converted" folder for completed files.

LibraryTemplates.Name: Samples/Trailers/Previews
LibraryTemplates.Description:
Finds any sample, trailers, or preview video files in a directory so you can delete them if necassary.
Useful for a matching 'SABnzbd Videos' library so the folder can be cleanly deleted after the main file is processed.

LibraryTemplates.Name: Video Library
LibraryTemplates.Description: Video library that searches for common video files

LibraryTemplates.Name: Image Library
LibraryTemplates.Description: Image library that searches for common image files

LibraryTemplates.Name: Music Library
LibraryTemplates.Description: Music library that searches for common music files

LibraryTemplates.Name: Plex DVR
LibraryTemplates.Description: Library to monitor Plex DVR recordings so you can automatically convert these after they have completed.

LibraryTemplates.Name: eBook Library
LibraryTemplates.Description: eBook library that searches for common eBook files

LibraryTemplates.Name: Comic Library
LibraryTemplates.Description: Comic library that searches for common comic book files

LibraryTemplates.Name: Audio Book Library
LibraryTemplates.Description: Audio Book library that searches for common audio book files

FlowTemplates.Name: Convert Video
FlowTemplates.Description: A flow that will convert a video file

FlowTemplates.Name: Convert Video: VP9
FlowTemplates.Description: Convert to VP9/webm/1080p with options to normalize the audio

FlowTemplates.Name: Convert Video to Audio
FlowTemplates.Description: A flow that will convert audio from a video file into a audio file

FlowTemplates.Name: Video File
FlowTemplates.Description: A blank Video template with a single "Video File" input node.

FlowTemplates.Name: Flow Failure
FlowTemplates.Description: A flow that will be executed when a Flow fails unexpectedly.

FlowTemplates.Name: File
FlowTemplates.Description: A blank file template with a single "Input File" input node.

FlowTemplates.Name: Folder
FlowTemplates.Description:
A blank folder template with a single "Input Folder" input node.
NOTE: This template should only be used to process a Folder instead of Files.  Processing a Folder has processing limitations as the Folder is being processed and not files contained in that folder.
For example you cannot convert a Folder to a MP3 or to a different Video format.  You can however zip a folder.

FlowTemplates.Name: Convert Audio to Video
FlowTemplates.Description:
Convert an audio file into a video file generated a visualization of the audio.
See the [Audio To Video](https://docs.fileflows.com/plugins/video-nodes/audio-to-video) node for more information

FlowTemplates.Name: Convert Audio
FlowTemplates.Description: Will convert audio files to the specified format and replace the original file.

FlowTemplates.Name: Audio File
FlowTemplates.Description: A blank Audio template with a single "Audio File" input node.

FlowTemplates.Name: Convert Comic
FlowTemplates.Description: A flow that will convert a comic books from CBR, CBZ, CB7, PDF, GZ, BZ2 to either CBZ or PDF

FlowTemplates.Name: Resize Image
FlowTemplates.Description: A flow to resize image files

FlowTemplates.Name: Image File
FlowTemplates.Description: A blank Image template with a single "Image File" input node.

CommunityFlowTemplates.Name: Convert Movies/TV to AV1/webm
CommunityFlowTemplates.Description: Converts movies and TV Shows for AV1/webm and moves the file.   Will crop black bars, and remove unwanted audio and subtitles.

CommunityFlowTemplates.Name: Convert Video to VP9/WebM/Opus/1080P
CommunityFlowTemplates.Description: Convert video to VP9/WebM/Opus/1080P and move to destination

CommunityFlowTemplates.Name: Convert Movies and Move
CommunityFlowTemplates.Description:
A video conversion flow that will convert videos to HEVC with AC3 audio.  It will then move these to the Output folder and deletes the source folder, if there are no more video files found in it.

This will always move the input file to the output file, even if no processing is required.

CommunityFlowTemplates.Name: Convert TV Shows and Move
CommunityFlowTemplates.Description:
A TV  conversion flow that will convert videos to HEVC with AC3 audio.  It will then move these to the Output folder and deletes the source folder, if there are no more video files found in it

Aimed at TV shows and uses a lower quality the similar Convert Movies and Move flow.

This will always move the input file to the output file, even if no processing is required.
